name: Cityscape (Maragato Entertainment)
description:
City life can be thrilling in the big metropolises, especially when one needs to cross a large avenue with no crosswalks. Cross the road without being hit by increasingly menacing vehicles, avoiding manholes. Collect some corn on the way for a chance to win extra lives. Watch out for snakes! Can you make it to the other side, safe and sound? Can you make it to the end of the 50th level?

Find your own way to survive 50 levels of ever-increasing difficulty, while you try to escape the city for greener spaces. Can you make it to the surprising end of this adventure?

Play with a gamepad or keyboard, in full screen or any window sizes. The game automatically pauses when minified and saves your progress on each level completion. Features progressive difficulty levelling.
